setupGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.SantoriniGame
Brief This method is divided in steps, also based on the rulebook's Setup section: 1) Map creation (rulebook's steps 1 and 2) 2) Players log in 3) Game mode request: if BASIC, loads the basic rules and randomly chooses the first player then goes to step 4) 3.1) Poll for the most god-like player election (rulebook's step 3) 3.2) God powers selection and "reading" (rulebook's steps 3, 4 and 5) 3.3) Cards assignment in clockwise order (rulebook's step 6) 3.4) First player choice (rulebook's step 7) 4) Workers selection and positioning (rulebook's step 7)
